title: Business Loan Underwriting Schema
description: A comprehensive schema for capturing data related to business loan underwriting, designed for API ingestion and credit risk modeling.

address.description: Standardized address structure used throughout the schema.

city.description: City where the location is situated.

stateProvince.description: State, province, or region where the location is situated.

postalCode.description: Postal or ZIP code of the location.

country.description: Country where the location is situated.

oneOf.description: Structure for Balance Sheet statement data, representing the financial position of the business at a specific point in time, following standard accounting principles.

assets.description: Categories of economic resources owned or controlled by the business, including current and non-current assets.

liabilities.description: Categories of economic obligations of the business, including current and non-current liabilities.

equity.description: Residual interest in the assets of the business after deducting liabilities, representing the owners' claim on the business.

oneOf.description: Structure for Income Statement data, representing the financial performance of the business over a period of time, following standard accounting principles.

revenue.description: Categories of income generated from the business's primary operations and other sources.

expenses.description: Categories of costs incurred in generating revenue and operating the business.

netIncome.description: The residual profit or loss after deducting all expenses from revenue, representing the business's bottom line performance.

oneOf.description: Structure for Cash Flow Statement data, representing the sources and uses of cash over a period of time, following standard accounting principles.

operatingActivities.description: Cash flows from the business's primary operations, including receipts from customers and payments to suppliers and employees.

investingActivities.description: Cash flows from the acquisition and disposal of long-term assets and investments.

financingActivities.description: Cash flows from changes in the business's capital structure, including debt and equity financing.

applicationMetadata.description: Metadata about the loan application process.

applicationDate.description: Date when the loan application was submitted.

applicationStatus.description: Current status of the loan application.

submissionDate.description: Date when the application was formally submitted for review. Can be null if not yet submitted.

underwriterId.description: Identifier of the assigned underwriter. Can be null if not yet assigned.

decisionDate.description: Date when a final decision was made. Can be null if no decision yet.

fundingDate.description: Date when the loan was funded. Can be null if not yet funded.

loanDetails.description: Core information about the requested loan and its terms.

loanId.description: Unique identifier for the loan application.

requestedAmount.description: The amount of the loan requested by the borrower.

currency.description: Currency code for the requested loan amount.

loanTermMonths.description: The requested term of the loan in months.

loanPurpose.description: Detailed description of the reason for the loan.

loanPurposeCategory.description: Standardized classification of the primary purpose for which the loan proceeds will be used, following industry standard loan purpose categories.

collateral.description: Details of any assets pledged as collateral for the loan.

collateralType.description: Classification of the asset being pledged as security for the loan, following standard collateral categorization in commercial lending.

collateralDescription.description: Specific description of the collateral asset.

estimatedValue.description: Estimated market value of the collateral.

valuationDate.description: Date when the collateral was valued.

borrowerInformation.description: Information about the business entity applying for the loan.

businessLegalName.description: Official registered name of the business.

doingBusinessAs.description: Any trade names used by the business. Can be null if not applicable.

entityType.description: Legal structure of the business entity, following standard business entity classifications. This determines the legal rights, obligations, and tax treatment of the business.

taxId.description: Business Tax Identification Number (e.g., EIN in the US).

industryClassification.description: Information about the business's industry classification.

codeType.description: Classification system used for industry identification.

code.description: The specific industry code assigned to the business.

description.description: Plain text description of the industry. Can be null if not provided.

formationDate.description: Date the business was legally formed.

yearsInBusiness.description: Calculated or provided number of years the business has been operating. Can be null if not provided.

phoneNumber.description: Primary contact phone number for the business.

websiteUrl.description: Business website URL. Can be null if not available.

financialStatements.description: Collection of historical and projected financial data for the business.

periodEndDate.description: End date of the financial period covered by the statement.

isProjected.description: Indicates whether this is a projected statement rather than historical data.

auditStatus.description: Level of third-party verification for the financial statement. Can be null if not provided.

scoreProvider.description: Provider of the business credit score.

reportDate.description: Date the credit report was pulled.

paymentBehaviorSummary.description: Overall summary of the business's payment behavior.

lenderName.description: Name of the lending institution or creditor.

originalAmount.description: Original principal amount of the debt.

currentBalance.description: Current outstanding balance of the debt.

monthlyPayment.description: Regular monthly payment amount for the debt.

publicRecords.description: Public legal records related to the business such as bankruptcies, liens, or judgments.

recordDate.description: Date the public record was filed or recorded.

details.description: Specific details about the public record.

ownershipStructure.description: Information about the ownership structure of the business.

owners.description: Information on individuals with significant ownership in the business.

ownerName.description: Full name of the business owner.

ownershipPercentage.description: Percentage of the business owned by this individual.

ownerRole.description: Role of the owner in the business. Can be null if not provided.

personalCreditScore.description: Owner's personal credit score (e.g., FICO or equivalent).

scoreProvider.description: Provider of the personal credit score.

reportDate.description: Date the personal credit report was pulled.

isGuarantor.description: Indicates whether this owner personally guarantees the loan.

guaranteeDetails.description: Specific details about the personal guarantee, if applicable. Can be null if not a guarantor or if details not provided.

externalFactors.description: Information about external factors that might influence the loan decision.

assessmentDate.description: Date the external factors were assessed.

macroeconomicData.description: Relevant economic indicators at the time of application.

interestRateBenchmark.description: Reference interest rate benchmark. Can be null if not provided.

benchmarkValue.description: Current value of the referenced interest rate benchmark. Can be null if not provided.

gdpGrowthRate.description: Relevant national or regional GDP growth rate. Can be null if not provided.

unemploymentRate.description: Relevant national or regional unemployment rate. Can be null if not provided.

industryBenchmarks.description: Performance metrics relative to the borrower's industry.

averageRevenueGrowth.description: Average revenue growth rate for the industry. Can be null if not provided.

averageProfitMargin.description: Average profit margin for the industry. Can be null if not provided.

debtToEquityRatioBenchmark.description: Industry benchmark for debt-to-equity ratio. Can be null if not provided.

economicOutlookSummary.description: Qualitative assessment of the relevant economic environment. Can be null if not provided.
